content: next marker metropolis is knit seamlessly from the top down the m1r k1 sm k1 m1l k1 wrap and turn 3 stitches neckline is shaped with short row and then the yoke is knit in the round sleeve stitches are set aside under- increased by tanis lavallée short row 2 ws purl to bor sm p1 m1l-p purl to 1 arm stitches are cast on and the body is completed stitch before next marker m1r-p p1 twice sm p1 sleeve stitches are then picked up and knit down to m1l-p p1 wrap and turn 5 stitches increased the cuff lastly stitches are picked up around the short row 3 rs knit to bor sm k1 m1l k to 1 st before neckline and the glorious turtleneck is the finishing next marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l k3 wrap and turn touch see note about hiding wraps 3 st2itc0hes1 inc1reased working short row short row 4 ws purl to bor sm p1 m1l-p purl to 1 wrap and turn a knit stitch with yarn in back slip next stitch before next marker m1r-p p1 twice sm p1 stitch purlwise to right hand needle bring yarn to m1l-p p3 wrap and turn 5 stitches increased front return slipped stitch to left hand needle bring short row 5 rs knit to bor sm k1 m1l k to 1 st before yarn to back then turn work next marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l k5 wrap and turn 3 wrap and turn a purl stitch with yarn in front slip next stitches increased stitch purlwise to right hand needle bring yarn to short row 6 ws purl to bor sm p1 m1l-p purl to 1 back return slipped stitch to left hand needle bring stitch before next marker m1r-p p1 twice sm p1 yarn to front then turn work m1l-p p5 wrap and turn 5 stitches increased hiding wrap on a knit stitch with right hand needle short row 7 rs knit to bor sm k1 m1l k to 1 st before pick up the wrap from the front and knit it together next marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l k7 wrap and turn 3 with the stitch it wraps stitches increased hiding wrap on a purl stitch with right hand needle short row 8 ws purl to bor sm p1 m1l-p purl to 1 pick up wrap through the back of loop and purl it stitch before next marker m1r-p p1 twice sm p1 together with the stitch it wraps m1l-p p7 wrap and turn 5 stitches increased 1x1 ribbing in the round 16 16 16 16 17 17 17 17 18 18 18 stitches per round 1 k1 p1 to end sleeve 33 34 34 34 36 36 36 36 38 38 38 stitches each front and back 98 100 100 100 106 106 106 instructions 106 112 112 112 stitches total using shorter larger circular needle recommended size 8 mm cast on 66 68 68 68 74 74 74 74 80
